LanguageData.ResearchAutoPowerSwitch.label: Automatic Power Switch
LanguageData.ResearchAutoPowerSwitch.description: Research a motion detector for the power switch. This will allow automatic power switching。
LanguageData.ResearchAutoPowerSwitch.descriptionDisco:
Now your power switch can be configured to automatically switch on when someone is in the room. Additionally further enhancement is now possible.
NOTE: Do not connect your lamps, turrets, etc. directly to the switch! Add a power cable and connect that!
